name: New in
description: Stunning product video ads, automaticlly created based on products you uploaded to your store in the past 30 days. We've placed your product images in pre-built, proven templates so you can increase sales without any effort.

name: Best seller
description: Smashing product video ads, automaticlly created based on your most sold products in the past 30 days. Wev'e placed your product images in pre-built, proven templates so you can increase sales without any effort.

name: On sale
description: Boost sales with product video ads, automaticlly created based on products you have allocated a discount on. You will also find product video ads with suggested promotions, all products are placed in pre-built, proven templates so you can increase sales without any effort.

name: Product videos
description: Product videos are here for you to embed inside your store's product page! Your Product videos are automatically created based on your most recent uploaded products. You can also manually create one on any product by simply searching for a product by its name from the search bar.
